title: Feminine fashions
creator_credit: K Khandpur, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: The costumes of Indian women and the accessories that go with them. The sari, the most popular dress, and also the pheran of Kashmiri women, the colorful dresses of the Khasi and Naga women of Assam, the salwar and kameez of the Punjab and the gharara and odhuni worn by the young women from Uttar Pradesh.
creator_credit_for_label: K Khandpur, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
